title: Advise on Estate Planning and Gift Tax
description: A wealthy individual wants to gift money to their children and grandchildren and needs to understand the gift tax rules.

tasks.description: Explain the annual gift tax exclusion amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates how much can be gifted to each person per year without tax consequences.

tasks.description: Explain the lifetime gift and estate tax exemption.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains how larger gifts can be made by using up a portion of the lifetime exemption.

tasks.description: Advise on strategies like setting up trusts or making direct payments for tuition or medical expenses to further minimize tax.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides advanced estate planning strategies.
